ValidationRule.description: When Template Strategy is 'Own Template' and IsActive is true, the TemplateContentVersionId field must be populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( IsActive__c = true, ISPICKVAL(Template_Strategy__c, "Own Template"), ISBLANK(TemplateContentVersionId__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Template ContentVersion ID is required when strategy is 'Own Template'.
